sidebar.text: I keep most of my projects in private repos away from prying eyes. However, every once in a while, I write code that the public can consume! Enjoy! And please let me know if you find any bugs by submitting an issue.

elements.title: R Website Generator
elements.description: Generate websites from a Yaml file and RMarkdown files!

elements.title: Enuff JS 4 D3
elements.description: A quick introductory course on Javascript that explains all that you need to know in order to get started with D3.js

elements.title: R Express
elements.description: An enhanced generator for Node/Express-based APIs and apps
